name: Colores
description:
With left mouse hold, rotate sliced wheel and try to match colors.
-New form of matching game.
-Match the colors, try not to fill the wheel.
-Various power-ups.
-Simply addictive gameplay.

Make  at least three of the same colors neighbor to destroy them.

Do not fill the wheel.

Be careful it gets harder.

Don’t forget to comment your feedbacks!! 

Have FUN!
